instruction: Generate a content strategy given the following information.
input:
Audience: Middle-aged professionals 
Product: mobile phone
output: A content strategy for a mobile phone product aimed at middle-aged professionals could include content around tips on the best phones for the busy professional, ways to maximize efficiency on the go, or ways to stay connected while on the go. Content could be created in the form of blogs, videos, and other multimedia such as podcasts. Content could also include how-tos on setting up your phone or performance reviews of different phone models.
